app.title: NLP Toolkit
app.description: A comprehensive toolkit for Natural Language Processing techniques
app.footer: Â© {year} NLP Course - All Rights Reserved

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: Collect text data for classification by scraping websites, downloading public datasets, or uploading your own data.
dataCollection.uploadDescription: Upload your own CSV file with text data for classification
dataCollection.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your CSV file here, or click to browse
dataCollection.dataPrivacy: Your data is processed locally and never leaves your computer

dataAugmentation.title: Data Augmentation
dataAugmentation.description: Increase the size and diversity of your dataset by applying text augmentation techniques.
dataAugmentation.augmentationDecisionDescription: Decide whether to augment your dataset or proceed with the original data.
dataAugmentation.shouldAugmentData: Would you like to augment your dataset to improve model performance?

dataCleaning.title: Data Cleaning
dataCleaning.description: Clean your text data by removing unwanted characters, symbols, and formatting.

textPreprocessing.title: Text Preprocessing
textPreprocessing.description: Preprocess your text data to prepare it for machine learning algorithms.

textRepresentation.title: Text Representation
textRepresentation.description: Convert text data into numerical features that can be used by machine learning algorithms.
textRepresentation.oneHotDescription: Represents each word as a binary vector where each dimension corresponds to a word in the vocabulary.
textRepresentation.bowDescription: Counts the frequency of each word in a document, ignoring word order.
textRepresentation.nGramDescription: Captures sequences of n consecutive words to preserve some context.
textRepresentation.tfidfDescription: Weights words based on their frequency in a document and rarity across all documents.
textRepresentation.word2vecDescription: Creates dense vector representations of words based on their context.
textRepresentation.gloveDescription: Global Vectors for Word Representation - captures global statistics of word co-occurrences.
textRepresentation.fasttextDescription: Similar to Word2Vec but works with character n-grams, handling out-of-vocabulary words better.
textRepresentation.doc2vecDescription: Extends Word2Vec to create vector representations for entire documents.
textRepresentation.sentenceDescription: Creates embeddings for entire sentences that capture semantic meaning.
textRepresentation.addItemsToSeeRepresentations: Add items to see their vector representations

textClassification.title: Text Classification
textClassification.description: Compare the performance of different machine learning models to classify text into predefined categories.
